description:
Quilted coziness for the smallest members of the family. Insulated with ThermoBall Eco insulation this Bunting suit lets you take your future explorer out to enjoy the winter wonderland, confident that they will stay toasty warm.

  • DWR-treated recycled polyester body sheds snow and mud
  • Insulated with ThermoBall™ Eco, 100% post-consumer recycled polyester insulation that mimics down clusters, trapping heat within small air pockets to retain warmth. ThermoBall also has the compressibility of down but the wet-weather warmth of synthetic insulation
  • Plush fleece lining in hood and upper body is warm, soft and easy to clean
  • Insulated 3-piece hood
  • Diagonal front zip makes loading and unloading easy
  • Fold-over mitts and booties protect tiny fingers and toes from the elements
  • Elastic binding on hood, cuffs and hems seal out drafts
  • Internal ID label makes daycare pick-ups a little smoother
name: The North Face Thermoball One Piece - Infants
